jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
GoMerchants is an engineering organization in Gojek which is responsible to provide the most efficient and reliable selling experience for hundreds of thousands of Gojek's online and offline merchants. To provide such experience, the QA team is responsible for all quality checks and overall testing of all the features/builds before releasing to actual users.

As Gojek is expanding rapidly, we are looking for highly driven, talented and self-motivated Software Test Engineers (SDETs) to help us tackle engineering challenges that are coming with it.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Create detailed, comprehensive and well-structured test plans and test cases
  • Design, develop and execute automation scripts using open source tools
  • Develop and apply testing processes for new and existing products to meet the day to day needs
  • Help to onboard and train new QA members joining in future
  • QA should able to perform Test Automation and setting up frameworks on multiple application platforms like Web, Mobile, and Desktop
  • Create & manage bug reports and communicate with the team
  • QA also work with deployments teams and resolving any level issues for the system
  • Building and managing automated build/test/deployment environments
  • Will require to travel between India and Indonesia on regular intervals

• Between 2-6 years of practical experience in Software Testing or similar role
  • Have a deep understanding of Manual & Automation test methodologies and principles
  • Experience of working with Web, Mobile and API Testing in both manual & automation testing
  • Highly Experienced with testing tools such as Jira, TestRail, Git, Appium, Selenium, RestAssured, TestNG, Cucumber, CI/CD pipelines etc.
  • Experience of working with programming languages like Java (preferably) / Python / Ruby etc
  • Solid analytical and problem-solving skills
  • Experience of working in Agile process management methodology
  • Great interpersonal and communication skills as needs to closely work with remote teams spread in multiple countries
  • Ability to spike and choose appropriate automated testing tools for the given problem statement
  • Knowledge of Performance & Security Testing and Linux/Unix commands
